LanguageData.ASReportsPrinter.label: trade reports printer
LanguageData.ASReportsPrinter.description: Records and applies trading rules for this colony. There can only be one trade printer or log per colony
LanguageData.ASReportsLog.label: trade reports log
LanguageData.ASReportsLog.description: A primitive log that records and applies trading rules for this colony. There can only be one trade printer or log per colony.
LanguageData.ASShoppingList.label: Shopping List
LanguageData.ASShoppingList.description: A Shopping list that can be carried by caravans.
